categoryProjects.title: Dotting GenAI: Pixel Art Editor With Generative AI
categoryProjects.excerpt: Dotting GenAI is an experimental project that aims to incorporate generative AI into the realm of pixel art. Alongside software development, a user research was conducted in order to gain insights into how experienced designers perceive the collaborative potential with Generative AI.
